data.actual_result: The text is highlighted and stays so even if you interact with something else.
data.expected_result: The message doesn't have any highlight since you're not clicking on it anymore.
data.short_description: Clicking on the "Server status" link in the connection problems message will cause the link to stay highlighted if you don't follow it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get the connection problems pop-up. (Switching to 2G only on your phone settings and restarting Discord should trigger it) - Click on "Server status" and then click out.
